description: Problem Description: A MemoryError occurs when attempting to process a regular expression (re) with a large amount of data, resulting in the program exceeding the available memory resources.
code:
import re 

pattern = re.compile(r'\d+')

data = '1' * 10**9

match = pattern.findall(data)

#This will result in a MemoryError due to the large amount of data being
